que: What is Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE (KARMA)?
ans: Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE (KARMA) AICTE is initiating “Kaushal Augmentation and Restructuring Mission of AICTE” (KARMA) for all AICTE approved institutions in the country to overcome the dual challenge of scarcity of skilled manpower in jobs and low skill level of those who are presently in jobs. For More Information : Read More

que: What is Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna (PMKVY)?
ans: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojna (PMKVY) AICTE is implementing the PMKVY for Technical Institutes scheme through AICTE approved Technical Institutions in the country.Under this Scheme in next three years, 10.5 Lakh youth are to be given Engineering Skills. For More Information : Read More

que: What is Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojna?
ans: Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojna Saansad Aadarsh Gram Yojana is a rural development programme broadly focusing upon the development in the villages which includes social development, cultural development and spread motivation among the people on social mobilization of the village community. For More Information : Read More

que: What is Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA)?
ans: Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) ARIIA is an initiative of Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), Govt. of India to systematically rank all major higher educational institutions and universities in India on indicators related to “Innovation and Entrepreneurship Development” amongst students and faculties.. For More Information : Read More
